msg: o Adding the sourceDirectory and unitTestSourceDirectory checks to the
o There is the start of the little dynamic tag library in here as well
but by default dynamic tags do not inherit or export from/to the

author: smor
msg: Added default goals to junit-report, changelog, activity
Modified site:generate to attain those goals.

author: smor
msg: Now, the "checkstyle" goal checks if the LICENSE.txt file exists.
If it doesn't, it shows a warning and does not attempt to run

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the dist:build goal so that it now finds project.properties, maven.xml and LICENSE.txt files.
Also I've split the goal into 2 parts introducing a dist:prepare-filesystem. This should allow pre/post goals to be done that add extra stuff into a distro.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o Apply a patch by martin.
